text:
Would be great if we could specify *post type* to filter available choices in the *page field*.

Example:

```{
	name: "page",
	label: "Page",
	type: "page",
	page_type: "blog_post"
}```
OR

```{
	name: "page",
	label: "Page",
	type: "page",
	page_type: ["blog_post", "landing_page"]
}```

For a better use of the *.json* files, an extension of the import function would be nice. That it can handle the Json format.
```{% import "./data.json" as data %}```
